book.title: The Thirteen Names of the First Patriarchs
book.description: 简介： Agreeable to your request I have endeavoured to recollect the parts of the Sermons, and present them to the Church of God, which is the pillar and ground of the truth. My mind has been fixed on the important subject of the Work of the Spiritfor what...
